title: Ash Of Souls Music pack
description: 10 Tracks in the style of medieval fantasy.
longDescription:
Amazing high-definition music pack. Listen HERE.

10 tracks in the style of medieval fantasy.


Tracklist:


1. Determinate

2. Departure

3. The Tempest

4. Argo Navis

5. Lords Of Ash

6. Desolated Realm

7. Awakening

8. Nomadic

9. Overlord

10. Little Adventure


1. Determinate

- Epic hybrid sound. The best decision for the trailer

- Association: Greatness, astonishment, beauty, nature, space, system, interaction.


2. Departure

- Dynamic fantasy orchestra. The great landscapes of the new world

- Association: Worry, preparation, sophistication, complexity, beauty, nature, cosmos.


3. The Tempest

- Mystical atmosphere leading to the dramatic part

- Association: Anxiety, infinity, universe, nature, tension, greatness.


4.Argo Navis

- Massive composition with a large variety. From fantasy to sci-fi

- Association: Future, spaceship, space, weightlessness, sorrow, memorials, greatness.


5. Lords Of Ash

- Scary atmosphere and suspense are decorated in a cinematic orchestral sound

- Association: Darkness, eclipse, atonement, exile, execution, fear.


6. Desolated Realm

- Ethnic fighting rhythm, heroic harmony

- Association: Darkness, battle, kingdom, warrior, mission, courage, honor.


7. Awakening


8. Nomadic


9. Overlord


10. Little Adventure


!Don't lose the opportunity to get up this powerful music for your game!
technicalDetails:
Features:

Number of Audio Waves: 10

Number of Audio Cues: 10

Sample rate / bit rate: r 44,100 Hz

Does music loop: NO

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes
